message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, Bob! Meet me halfway!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Alice, the clock is ticking!
Don't be stubborn, Bob. This is a fair deal!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. We split it down the middle, and we both walk away with something substantial.
Bob, I think we can both do better than a 50/50 split!
